resources.string: Root access could not be obtained
There was a problem backing up

This application displays the wireless networks and keys which your phone stores in plain text in a file often called wpa_supplicant.conf. This application provides you with the ability to view and share your wireless configurations. Additionally you can backup and restore your wpa_supplicant.conf file to/from your SD card. The wpa_supplicant.conf file should not be modified by hand. If for some reason your wireless configuration gets corrupted, use the Reset function. 
 
Created by Ian Foster 
http://lanrat.com
Click to backup your WIFI Configuration to your SD card \n(copies wpa_supplicant.conf to the root of your SD card)
\nClick to Restore your backup from your SD card \nWarning: only restore unmodified backups made by this phone!
\nIn case a restore failed, reset your wireless configuration. \n(Resets wpa_supplicant.conf to its default values)
Are you sure you want to Reset?
Error: Could not find wpa_supplicant.conf on SD card root!
